src:
Harapan RD ke Iwan Bule: Menata Kompetisi, Perbaiki Sistem Pemanggilan ke Timnas Indonesia
04 Nov 2019, 22:50 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSSI kini punya pengurus baru. Dalam empat tahun kedepan, federasi sepak bola di Tanah Air itu akan dipimpin oleh Mochamad Iriawan.
Tentunya banyak yang menggantungkan harapan pada pria yang akrab disapa Iwan Bule itu. Tak terkecuali pelatih Tira Persikabo, Rahmad Darmawan.
"Ada banyak soal harapan. Tapi kalau kompetisi, kita ingin jadwal yang jelas, taat dengan regulasi FIFA. Lalu keluar-masuknya pemain tim nasional seperti apa keharusannya," ujar pelatih yang akrab disapa RD ini.
"Jujur, kemarin saya kritik soal itu pemain klub memperkuat timnas. Kan pemain itu buat klub, tapi malah kita tidak bisa pakai, itu satu contoh," katanya menambahkan.

Baca halaman berikutnya ya Bolaneters
text:
RD hopes to Iwan Bule: Organize the Competition, Improve the Calling System to the Indonesian National Team
Nov 04 2019, 22:50 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSSI now has a new administrator. In the next four years, the football federation in the country will be led by Mochamad Iriawan.
Of course many are pinning their hopes on the man who is familiarly called Iwan Bule. Tira Persikabo's coach, Rahmad Darmawan, is no exception.
"There are many questions about hope. But if the competition, we want a clear schedule, abide by FIFA regulations. Then the entry and exit of national team players what kind of necessity," said the coach who is familiarly called RD.
"Honestly, yesterday I was criticized about the club's players strengthening the national team. It's a player for the club, but instead we can't use it, that's one example," he added.

Read the next page, Bolaneters
